name: Mixer Stereo
description: This algorithm is a stereo mixer â€“ it mixes mono or stereo inputs to a stereo output. Up to four aux send busses are available, which can be switched to pre- or post-fade. Sends may also be set to be mono or stereo.

specifications.name: channels
specifications.description: The number of mixer channels, ranging from 1 to 12.

specifications.name: sends_per_channel
specifications.description: The number of aux sends per channel, ranging from 0 to 4.

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: A text name for the channel for identification.

parameters.name: Pre/post (send)
parameters.description: Whether the send is Pre-fade or Post-fade.

parameters.name: Width (send)
parameters.description: Whether the send is mono or stereo. Stereo sends use the destination bus and the next one up.

input_ports.name: Input left/mono (channel)
input_ports.description: The channel's left or mono input bus.

input_ports.name: Input right (channel, if stereo)
input_ports.description: The channel's right input bus when operating in stereo mode.

output_ports.name: Left output
output_ports.description: The left output bus for the mixed signal.

output_ports.name: Right output
output_ports.description: The right output bus for the mixed signal (if stereo).
